name: fuel_type_code
desc_long: The type of alternative fuel the station provides. Fuel types are given as code values as described below:

name: station_name
desc_short: The name of the station.

name: street_address
desc_short: The street address of the station's location.

name: intersection_directions
desc_short: Brief additional information about how to locate the station.

name: city
desc_short: The city of the station's location.

name: state
desc_short: The two character code for the U.S. state or Canadian province/territory of the station's location.

name: zip
desc_short: The ZIP code (postal code) of the station's location.

name: plus4
desc_short: The plus-4 portion of the station's ZIP code (U.S. ZIP codes only).

name: country
desc_long: The two character country code of the station's location.

name: station_phone
desc_short: The phone number of the station.

name: status_code
desc_long: The current status of the station, given as code values as described below:

name: expected_date
desc_short: For planned stations, the date the station is expected to open or start carrying alternative fuel. For temporarily unavailable stations, the date the station is expected to reopen. This date is estimated.

name: access_code
desc_long: A description of who is allowed to access the station, given as code values as described below:

name: access_detail_code
desc_long: A description of other station access information, given as code values as described below:

name: groups_with_access_code
desc_long: Deprecated: See the

name: access_days_time
desc_short: Hours of operation for the station.

name: cards_accepted
desc_long: A space-separated list of payment methods accepted. Payment methods are given as code values as described below:

name: owner_type_code
desc_long: The type of organization that owns the fueling infrastructure. Owner types are given as code values as described below:

name: federal_agency
desc_short: If the station is owned by a federal agency, a record for the federal agency that owns this station. See

name: bd_blends
desc_short: For biodiesel stations, the level of biodiesel blends the station provides.

name: e85_blender_pump
desc_long: For E85 stations, an indication of whether the station has a blender pump on site, given as a boolean:

name: e85_other_ethanol_blends
desc_long: For E85 stations, an array of strings identifying the range(s) of blends other than E85 available at the station, given as code values described below:

name: lpg_nozzle_types
desc_long: For LPG stations, an array of strings, identifying the type of nozzles available at the station, given as code values described below:

name: lpg_primary
desc_long: For propane stations, the type of station, given as a boolean:

name: ng_fill_type_code
desc_short: Deprecated: See

name: ng_psi
desc_short: Deprecated: See

name: ng_vehicle_class
desc_short: Deprecated: For CNG stations, see

name: rd_blends
desc_short: For renewable diesel stations, the level of renewable diesel blends the station provides.

name: rd_blends_fr
desc_short: For renewable diesel stations, the level of renewable diesel blends the station provides, in French, if available.

name: rd_blended_with_biodiesel
desc_long: For renewable diesel stations, whether the station provides renewable diesel blended with biodiesel, given as code values as described below:

name: rd_max_biodiesel_level
desc_short: For renewable diesel stations, the maximum biodiesel level if blended with biodiesel.

name: cng_dispenser_num
desc_short: For CNG stations, the number of CNG dispensers installed.

name: cng_fill_type_code
desc_long: For CNG stations, the type of dispensing capability available, given as code values as described below:

name: cng_psi
desc_long: For CNG stations, a space separated list of PSI pressures available.

name: cng_renewable_source
desc_long: For CNG stations, the type of renewable energy used to generate CNG on-site, given as code values as described below:

name: cng_total_compression
desc_short: For CNG stations, the total compressor capacity per compressor, measured in standard cubic feet per minute (scfm).

name: cng_total_storage
desc_short: For CNG stations, the total storage capacity, measured in standard cubic feet (scf).

name: cng_vehicle_class
desc_long: For CNG stations, the maximum vehicle size that can physically access the fueling infrastructure, given as code values as described below:

name: lng_renewable_source
desc_long: For LNG stations, the type of renewable energy used to generate LNG on-site, given as code values as described below:

name: lng_vehicle_class
desc_long: For LNG stations, the maximum vehicle size that can physically access the fueling infrastructure, given as code values as described below:

name: ev_level1_evse_num
desc_short: For electric stations, the number of Level 1 EVSE ports.

name: ev_level2_evse_num
desc_short: For electric stations, the number of Level 2 EVSE ports.

name: ev_dc_fast_num
desc_short: For electric stations, the number of DC Fast EVSE ports.

name: ev_other_evse
desc_short: For electric stations, the number and type of additional EVSE ports, such as:

name: ev_connector_types
desc_long: For electric stations, an array of strings identifying the connector types available at this station. Valid connector types are:

name: ev_network
desc_long: For electric stations, the name of the EV charging network, if applicable.

name: ev_network_ids
desc_short: For electric stations, if the station belongs to an EV charging network, a record describing the network-specific IDs for this station. See

name: ev_network_web
desc_short: For electric stations, the EV charging network Web site, if applicable.

name: ev_pricing
desc_short: For electric stations, information about whether and how much users must pay to use the EVSE port.

name: ev_renewable_source
desc_long: For electric stations, the type of renewable energy used to generate electricity on-site, given as code values as described below:

name: hy_is_retail
desc_long: For hydrogen stations, whether a station offers the retail sale of hydrogen by accepting payment at the point of sale, given as code values as described below:

name: hy_pressures
desc_long: For hydrogen stations, any array of strings identifying the pressures of the hydrogen available (in bar), given as code values as described below:

name: hy_standards
desc_long: For hydrogen stations, any array of strings identifying which SAE International fueling protocol standard(s) the infrastructure meets, given as code values as described below:

name: hy_status_link
desc_short: For hydrogen stations, a link to a website that provides up-to-date information about the current status of this hydrogen station.

name: geocode_status
desc_long: A rating indicating the approximate accuracy of the latitude and longitude for the station's address, given as code values as described below:

name: latitude
desc_short: The latitude of the station's address (see the "Geocode Status" field for details on the latitude's accuracy).

name: longitude
desc_short: The longitude of the station's address (see the "Geocode Status" field for details on the longitude's accuracy).

name: open_date
desc_long: The date that the station began offering the fuel. Note that most propane (LPG) stations do not have open dates. Some open dates are approximate. For electric vehicle charging stations added to the Station Locator through automated data feeds from charging networks, this is either the date provided by the charging network or the date it appeared in the Station Locator if the charging network does not provide an open date. See the

name: date_last_confirmed
desc_short: The date the station's details were last confirmed.

name: updated_at
desc_short: The time the station's details were last updated (

name: id
desc_short: A unique identifier for this specific station.

name: facility_type
desc_long: The type of facility at which the station is located, given as code values as described below:

name: intersection_directions_fr
desc_short: Brief additional information about how to locate the station, in French, if available.

name: access_days_time_fr
desc_short: Hours of operation for the station, in French, if available.

name: bd_blends_fr
desc_short: For biodiesel stations, the level of biodiesel blends the station provides, in French, if available.

name: groups_with_access_code_fr
desc_long: Deprecated: See the

name: ev_pricing_fr
desc_short: For electric stations, information about whether and how much users must pay to use the EVSE port, in French, if available.

name: restricted_access
desc_long: For public stations, an indication of whether the station has restricted access, given as a boolean:
